description:
Nguyen Van Thieu was an http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] Rear Admiral who served as a Squadron Commander of http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn Fortress] during its occupation by the Free Planets Alliance.
He was killed when his flagship, the http://anidb.net/ch82168 [Maurya], was destroyed by forces under High Admiral http://anidb.net/ch194 [Oskar von Reuenthal] in early 798 UC.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Nguyen Van Thieu
